text: Lucas Rodrigues da Silva (born 27 August 1999) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for the Portuguese club Mafra on loan from Moreirense. ==Professional career== On 22 August 2018, Rodrigues signed his first professional contract with Moreirense. Rodrigues made his professional debut with Moreirense in a 2-0 Primeira Liga win over Portimonense S.C. on 29 March 2019. On 30 August 2019 he joined Mafra on loan. ==References== ==External links== * * ZeroZero Profile Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Moreirense F.C. players Category:Mirassol Futebol Clube players Category:C.D. title: Lucas Rodrigues
